statements: DELETE FROM route_schedule WHERE start_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM route_schedule WHERE route_id = 100 AND truck_id = 200
DELETE FROM route_schedule WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles'
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'City Loop';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1 AND departure_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM routes WHERE truck_id = 5 OR driver_id = 10;
DELETE FROM driver_schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
